pura pasaloswaka pohoya dinaya subha katayuthu sadaha sudusulesa bauddhayan sithima sadharanaya manda thiloguru buduradun pawa pura pasaloswaka thithiya thama diwiye wishesha katayuthu sadaha yoda gaththe nam pruthagjanayan wana apata edina asubha wanne kesedayi gataluwak pana nagina bawini.namuth mehidi wisheshayen salakiya yuthu karuna wanne buddha charithaye pawa edina siduwi aththe laukika subha katayuthu walata wada lokoththara katayuthu bawayi.enam buddha charithaye ipadima,abhinishkramanaya, buduwima,palamu dharma deshanaya,piriniwima wani da misa nam thabima,akuru kiyawima,wiwahaya wani katayuthu sadaha pura pasaloswaka dina yeduna bawa sadahan wi natha.

balagathu shri lankawak, salasum sahagatha gamanak, katath yamak kamak labena aarthikayak thema kara ganimin shri lankawe idiri sanwardhana katayuthu dipa wyapthawa kriyathmaka kirime janapathige ‘thirasara yugayaka - thewasara arambauma’ aarthika salasma agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha wisin ada (4) sawasa 2. 30ta araliyagaha madure di prakashayata path karayi.
meka nan pudumayak!
4 shri lankawe kiri nishpadanaye sampradayaka pasubima.
